sourcesContent:
import { Box, Flex, Heading, Text, VStack } from '@chakra-ui/react';

const About = () => (
  <Box id="about" py="10" px="5" bg="blackAlpha.800" borderTop="2px solid" borderColor="orange.500">
    <Flex
      direction="column"
      align="center"
      justify="center"
      maxW="900px"
      mx="auto"
      gap="8"
    >
      {/* About Text Section */}
      <VStack align="center" textAlign="center" spacing="5">
        <Heading size="xl" color="orange.500">About Me</Heading>
        <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.400" maxW="700px">
          Hi, I'm Kenneth, a dedicated front-end web developer passionate about creating engaging, responsive, and user-friendly digital experiences. My expertise lies in using modern front-end technologies such as React.js, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to bring innovative designs to life. I thrive in environments that push me to solve complex problems through intuitive design and clean code.
        </Text>
        <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.400" maxW="700px">
          As a lifelong learner, I continuously seek out opportunities to grow and expand my skillset. I love staying updated with the latest in web development trends and technologies, and I enjoy collaborating with other talented professionals to create impactful projects. When I'm not coding, you’ll find me exploring new ideas to solve real-world problems through technology.
        </Text>
        <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.400" maxW="700px">
          I’m always excited about working on projects that challenge me creatively and technically. Let’s connect and work together to build something amazing!
        </Text>
      </VStack>
    </Flex>
  </Box>
);

export default About;
